header: Enabling your organization with Crazy People Dot COM is
firstParagraph: Using our product,  you can manage things on a scale you never imagined possible.
secondParagraph: The product portal is your command-central where you can manage your Crazy People Dot COM users.  It also gives you access to analytics so you can get an idea of how Crazy People Dot COM usage is helping your business.
help_text: Need help with Crazy People Dot COM?
